Detailed Description

The class LevelMatchFilter allows logging events with a specified level.

Note:
The ownership and lifetime of objects of this class are managed. See Object ownership for more details.

Property Documentation

bool Log4Qt::LevelMatchFilter::acceptOnMatch [inline, read, write]

The property holds if an event is accpeted on a match.

The default is true.

See also:
acceptOnMatch(), setAcceptOnMatch()
Level Log4Qt::LevelMatchFilter::levelToMatch [inline, read, write]

The property holds the level to match for this filter.

The default is Level::NULL_INT.

See also:
levelToMatch(), setLevelToMatch()
